mapper.sql: PARTY_INFO PI INNER JOIN MOUNTAIN_INFO MI ON PI.MI_NUM = MI.MI_NUM INNER JOIN PARTY_MEMBER PM ON PI.PI_NUM = PM.PI_NUM AND PM_ACTIVE = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT P_VIEW.PI_NUM, MNTNM, MEM_NUM, COUNT(PUL.UI_NUM) LIKE_NUM,
FROM (SELECT PI.PI_NUM, COUNT(PM.UI_NUM) MEM_NUM,
FROM
WHERE PI_ACTIVE = 1 GROUP BY PI.PI_NUM) P_VIEW INNER JOIN PARTY_USER_LIKE PUL ON P_VIEW.PI_NUM = PUL.PI_NUM
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
GROUP BY PUL.PI_NUM ORDER BY LIKE_NUM DESC

SELECT P_VIEW.PI_NUM, MNTNM, MEM_NUM, COUNT(PUL.UI_NUM) LIKE_NUM,
,UI.UI_NICKNAME FROM (SELECT PI.PI_NUM, COUNT(PM.UI_NUM) MEM_NUM, PI.UI_NUM,
FROM
WHERE PI.PI_NUM = #{piNum}) P_VIEW INNER JOIN PARTY_USER_LIKE PUL ON P_VIEW.PI_NUM = PUL.PI_NUM INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PI.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM

SELECT UI_IMG_PATH, UI_NICKNAME, UI_AGE, UI_GENDER FROM PARTY_INFO PI INNER JOIN PARTY_MEMBER PM ON PI.PI_NUM = PM.PI_NUM AND PM_ACTIVE = 1 INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PM.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM AND UI_ACTIVE = 1 WHERE PI.PI_NUM = #{piNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY_INFO SET PI_NAME = #{piName}, PI_EXPDAT = #{piExpdat}, PI_MEETING_TIME = #{piMeetingTime}, PI_MEMBER_CNT = #{piMemberCnt}, PI_PROFILE = #{piProfile}, PI_LMODAT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') WHERE PI_NUM = #{piNum}
